item.description:
This month we will meet at Slade's which offers good food, a spacious bar, and live music. This will be an informal mix and mingle type of event. Come on out and enjoy yourself.

Travel:

Tremont and some side streets have free parking. There are also affordable lots in the area. T users, the closest stops are Ruggles and Mass Ave. on the Orange Line.

Finding Us:

We'll "headquarter" by the bar, closer to the entrance and spread out from there.

Note:

Always check the event page the day of the meetup to see if any details changes. Last minute changes will be posted to the site and sent via email to those that RSVPed.
item.name: July Monthy Social
